items.desc: The holder gains @BonusAP@ additional Spell Power.
items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap

items.desc:

items.desc:
When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by @CostIncrease@% until they cast.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for @HealthRestore@ Health.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Warden's Mail

items.desc:
When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for @BanishDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc: This champion starts combat with 30 additional mana.
items.name: Ocean Hex

items.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

[Consumes Three Item Slots]

items.desc:
Basic Attacks grant +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times.

The holder gains the Duelist trait.

items.desc: Enemies within @HexRange@ hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by @MRShred@% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to @ManaRatio@% of their max Mana.
items.name: Ionic Spark

items.desc: Reduces incoming magic damage by @MagicReduction@%.
items.name: Dragon's Claw

items.desc:
Critical hits against the wearer deal normal damage instead.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Phantom Dancer

items.desc: Blocks the first enemy spell that hits the wearer, and stuns the spell's caster for @StunDuration@ seconds.

items.desc:

[KAYN CONSUMABLE - This item disappears when used and DESTROYS Kayn's Liberation]

items.desc: Reflects @DamageReflect@% of the mitigated damage from enemy Basic Attacks as magic damage.

items.desc: The holder gains @ArmorPerEnemy@ Armor and @MRPerEnemy@ Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.
items.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate

items.desc: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal @1StarAoEDamage@/@2StarAoEDamage@/@3StarAoEDamage@ %i:star% magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every @ICD@ seconds).

items.desc: +@AS@% Attack Speed

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.desc: This champion starts combat with an additional @AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack Speed.
items.name: Inferno Hex

items.desc:
At start of combat, and every @ICD@ seconds thereafter, a random enemy within @HexRange@ hexes is burned for @BurnPercent@% of their maximum health over @BurnDuration@ seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by @GrievousWoundsPercent@%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Sunfire Cape

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

No stacking limit.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Repeating Crossbow

items.desc:
At the beginning of each planning phase, the wearer gains one of the following:
  • Basic attacks and spells deal +@TraitMultiplier@% Damage.
  • Basic attacks and spells heal for @TraitMultiplier@% of damage dealt.
items.name: Hand Of Justice

items.desc: Basic Attacks have a @ChanceOnHitToShrink@% chance on-hit to decrease the target's star level by 1 for the rest of combat.
items.name: Cursed Blade

items.desc: Prevents the wearer's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After @StasisDuration@ seconds, they return with @HealthRestore@ Health and shed all negative effects.
items.name: Guardian Angel

items.desc:
After casting their spell, the wearer's Mana is set to @ManaRestore@.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Blue Buff

items.desc: +@Mana@ Mana
items.name: Tear of the Goddess

items.desc:

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at @StartingStacks@).
items.name: Deathblade

items.desc: +@MagicResist@ Magic Resist
items.name: Negatron Cloak

items.desc: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a @DamageIncreasePercent@% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to @StackCap@ times, at which point the wearer gains @BonusResistsAtStackCap@ Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.
items.name: Titan's Resolve

items.name: Runaan's Hurricane

Wearer is also a Yordle
Extra +10% Critical Strike Chance, +10% Dodge Chance

+@DodgeChance@% Dodge Chance

items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade

items.desc: When the holder casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to @ExtraBounces@ nearby enemies are dealt an additional @Damage@ magic damage, plus @BonusDamageVsShieldOrCC@ if they are shielded or crowd-controlled.
items.name: Luden's Echo

items.name: B. F. Sword

items.desc: On falling below @HealthPercent@% Health, become untargetable, invulnerable, but unable to move for @StasisDuration@ seconds.

The wearer gains the Warlord trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Warlord's Banner

items.desc:
When the wearer inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced by @ArmorReductionPercent@% for @ArmorBreakDuration@ seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Last Whisper

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

No stacking limit.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Repeating Crossbow

items.desc:
When the wearer dies, Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped to a new ally. Each time Repeating Crossbow is re-equipped, it grants an additional +@AttackSpeedPerStack@% Attack Speed and +@CritChancePerStack@% Critical Strike Chance for the remainder of combat.

No stacking limit.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Repeating Crossbow

items.desc: Wearer's team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ maximum team size.
items.name: Force of Nature

items.desc:
The wearer is immune to crowd control for the first @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds of combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Quicksilver

items.desc:
Contributing to a kill grants the holder +@ADPerStack@ Attack Damage for the rest of combat.

This effect can stack any number of times (starting at @StartingStacks@).
items.name: Deathblade

items.desc: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within @HexRange@ hex in the same row gain @BonusAP@ Spell Power for the rest of combat.
items.name: Chalice of Power

items.desc: Grants @TooltipDisplayHealth@ bonus Health (including components).
items.name: Warmog's Armor

items.desc: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals @Damage@ magic damage to @1StarBounces@/@2StarBounces@/@3StarBounces@ %i:star% enemies, and @BonusDamage@ true damage if they are shielded or crowd-controlled.
items.name: Statikk Shiv

items.desc:
The wearer gains the Blademaster trait.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
items.name: Blade of the Ruined King

items.desc: This slot can't hold an item.
items.name: Unusable Slot

items.desc: The holder's spells heal them for @OmniVamp@% of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder against up to @ShieldMax@ damage.
items.name: Hextech Gunblade

items.desc: At the end of each planning phase this champion permanently gains @HPPerRound@ max health.
items.name: Mountain Hex

ability.desc: Ziggs throws a bomb at an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Bomb!

ability.desc:
Passive: Jinx gets excited as she helps take down enemy units!

After her first takedown, Jinx gains @PercentAttackSpeed@ bonus Attack Speed.

After her second takedown, Jinx swaps to her rocket launcher, causing her Basic Attacks to deal @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage to all enemies in a small area around her target.
ability.name: Get Excited!

ability.desc: Yasuo blinks to the farthest enemy in range, knocks them up for @StunDuration@ seconds, and Attacks them @ModifiedAttacks@ times (applies on-hit effects).
ability.name: Last Breath

ability.desc: Passive: Malphite starts combat with a shield equal to @ModifiedPercentHealth@ of his maximum health.
ability.name: Energy Shield

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds Master Yi gains massively increased movement speed, heals for @ModifiedHeal@ of his maximum health each second, and deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus true damage with his Basic Attacks.
ability.name: Chosen One

ability.desc:
Aurelion Sol launches fighters which fly out to random enemies and blast them, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and draining @ManaDrain@ mana, then return.

The first time he casts, Aurelion Sol launches @InitialFighters@ fighters. Subsequent casts launch all returned fighters, plus @FightersPerCast@ additional.
ability.name: Mobilize the Fleet

ability.desc:
Ekko shatters the timeline, freezing all units in time before attacking @NumAttacks@ times dealing @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage and applying on-hit effects. Each strike targets the highest attack speed enemy and slows their attack speed by 50% for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

Ekko cannot die while he has stopped time.
ability.name: Chronobreak

ability.desc: Fiora enters a defensive stance for @BlockDuration@ seconds, becoming immune to damage and enemy spell effects. As she exits this stance, she ripostes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Riposte

ability.desc: Vi charges at the farthest enemy, knocking aside all enemies in her path and dealing them @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ magic damage. When she reaches her target, she knocks them up for @CCDuration@ seconds and deals @ModifiedPrimaryDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Assault and Battery

ability.desc: Irelia dashes to her target, Basic Attacking them for @ModifiedPercentAD@ of her Attack Damage. If this kills the target, she Bladesurges again immediately at the enemy with the highest mana. (Total Damage: @TooltipDamage@)
ability.name: Bladesurge

ability.desc: Poppy throws her buckler at the furthest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. The buckler then bounces back, granting Poppy a shield that blocks @ModifiedShield@ damage.
ability.name: Buckler Toss

ability.desc: Soraka heals all of her allies for @ModifiedHeal@.
ability.name: Wish

ability.desc: Ahri fires an orb in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through on the way out, and @ModifiedDamage@ true damage on the way back.
ability.name: Orb of Deception

ability.desc:
Syndra pulls in all orbs on the battlefield and creates @Spheres@ new ones, then fires them all at the enemy with the highest current Health percentage, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage per orb.

Lowest total health breaks targeting ties.
ability.name: Unleashed Power

ability.desc: Neeko leaps into the air and slams into the ground, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Pop Blossom

ability.desc: Gangplank calls down an orbital strike around his target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ damage to all enemies in a large area after @ImpactDelayTime@ seconds.
ability.name: Orbital Strike

ability.desc:
Darius dunks an enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If this kills the target, Darius immediately casts again.

Targets below @HealthThreshold@% health take double damage.
ability.name: Dreadnova Guillotine

ability.desc: Jayce slams his hammer, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies.
ability.name: To the Skies!

ability.desc: Annie blasts a cone of fire dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield with @ModifiedShield@ health for herself for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Galaxy Shield-Blast

ability.desc: Fizz throws a lure that attracts a shark. It deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies caught, knocking them back and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Chum the Waters

ability.desc: Rumble torches his enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over @Duration@ seconds, and reducing healing on them by @GrievousWoundsPercent@% for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Flamespitter

ability.desc: Ezreal fires an electromagnetic pulse at a random enemy that explodes on impact, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ damage to all nearby enemies and increasing the cost of their next spellcast by @PercentCostIncrease@%.
ability.name: E.M.P.

ability.desc: Shen creates a zone around himself for @ZoneDuration@ seconds, in which all nearby allies automatically dodge incoming Basic Attacks. While it's active, Shen gains @ModifiedMR@ Magic Resist.
ability.name: Future's Refuge

ability.desc: Wukong spins, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies over @Duration@ seconds. The first time Wukong hits each enemy, he knocks them into the air and stuns them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Cyclone

ability.desc: Thresh tosses his lantern towards @UnitCount@ random unit(s) on your bench, pulling them into combat and granting them @ModifiedMana@ bonus Mana. Traits are unaffected.
ability.name: Temporal Passage

ability.desc: Caitlyn takes aim at the farthest enemy, firing a deadly bullet towards them that deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
ability.name: Ace In The Hole

ability.desc: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to each enemy they pass through.
ability.name: Wild Cards

ability.desc: Xin Zhao quickly strikes his target three times, dealing Basic Attack damage and applying on-hit effects. The third strike knocks his target up for @StunDuration@ seconds and deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Three Talon Strike

ability.desc: Lulu polymorphs the @NumTargets@ nearest enemies for @Duration@ seconds, causing them to hop aimlessly, unable to attack or cast. Polymorphed enemies take @ModifiedBonusDamage@ additional damage from all sources.
ability.name: Mass Polymorph

ability.desc: Xayah creates a storm of feather-blades, gaining @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Deadly Plumage

ability.desc: Rakan dashes to the furthest enemy within range and leaps into the air, knocking them up for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Grand Entrance

ability.desc: Ashe fires an arrow at the farthest enemy that explodes on the first target hit, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all nearby enemies and stunning them for @StunDurationPerSquare@ seconds.
ability.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow

ability.desc: Mordekaiser gains a shield for that absorbs @ModifiedShield@ damage over @Duration@ seconds. While the shield persists, Mordekaiser deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage per second to all nearby enemies.
ability.name: Indestructible

ability.desc: Shaco teleports and backstabs his target for @TooltipPercentage@ of his Basic Attack damage. This is also always a critical hit. (Total: @TooltipADBonus@)
ability.name: Deceive

ability.desc: Jarvan calls down his standard to a nearby location, granting all nearby allies @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Ageless Standard

ability.desc:
At start of combat, Karma bonds to her closest ally.

Karma grants the bonded ally (or a random one if that ally is dead) a @ModifiedShield@-health shield for @Duration@ seconds. While the shield holds, the ally receives @ModifiedAS@ bonus Attack Speed.
ability.name: Inspire

ability.desc:
Passive: Jhin attacks @AttackSpeed@ times per second, regardless of bonus Attack Speed. Jhin converts each 1% of bonus Attack Speed he has into 0.8 Attack Damage.

Passive: Every fourth shot, Jhin deals @ModifiedPercent@ damage. (Total: @TooltipDamage@)
ability.name: Whisper

ability.desc:
Zoe kicks a bubble at the enemy with the the highest current Health percentage, stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.

Highest total health breaks targeting ties.
ability.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

ability.desc:
Blitzcrank pulls the farthest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

His next attack after pulling knocks up for 1 second.

Allies within range will prefer to attack Blitzcrank's target.
ability.name: Rocket Grab

ability.desc: Leona creates a barrier, reducing all incoming damage by @ModifiedDamageReduction@ for 4 seconds.
ability.name: Cyber Barrier

ability.desc: Lucian dashes away from his current target, then Basic Attacks them and fires a second shot which deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Relentless Pursuit

ability.desc: Kayn swings his scythe, dealing @Damage@ to enemies in a line.
ability.name: Blade's Reach

ability.desc: Kayn temporarily infests the furthest enemy, dealing @TargetDamage@ to the target when he bursts out.
ability.name: Umbral Trespass

ability.desc:
Passive: The Super-Mech's attacks cleave the area in front of it.

The Super-Mech calls down a devastating blast at its target's location, dealing @ModifiedMainDamage@ magic damage to its target and @ModifiedSplashDamage@ magic damage to all other nearby enemies.

This spell's damage increases with the Star Level of the Super-Mech's Pilots.
ability.name: Mecha Justice

ability.desc: Graves launches a smoke grenade toward the enemy with the most Attack Speed. The grenade explodes on impact dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies and causing their attacks to miss for @BlindDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Smoke Grenade

ability.desc: Xerath transforms, summoning meteors to strike random foes in place of his normal attacks for @Duration@ seconds. Meteors deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage upon impact and if they kill their target, all adjacent enemies take @ModifiedAoEDamage@ magic damage and are stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Abyssal Bombardment

ability.desc:
Gnar leaps towards his target and transforms into Mega Gnar, throwing nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @RCCDuration@ seconds.

While in Mega Gnar form, Gnar is melee and gains @TransformHealth@ Health and @TransformAD@ Attack Damage.
ability.name: GNAR!

ability.desc: Teemo scatters 3 traps around the nearest enemy. When an enemy nears a trap (or after @DetonationDelay@ seconds), it explodes on nearby enemies dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, knocking them down, and slowing them for @SlowDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Satellite Traps

ability.desc: Nautilus erupts the ground beneath his target, knocking them up and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds, and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. Enemies adjacent to the target receive half of this effect.
ability.name: Impact Crater

ability.desc: Illaoi slams a tentacle in a line in front of her, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ damage and stealing @ResistStealPercent@% Armor and Magic Resist from each target hit for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Tentacle Smash

ability.desc: Nocturne terrifies his target, stunning them with fear for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration.
ability.name: Unspeakable Horror

ability.desc: Viktor burns a path between the two enemies most distant from one another, first dealing @ModifiedPercentHealthDamage@% maximum Health in magic damage, then 1 second later dealing @ModifiedFlatDamage@ magic damage in an explosion along the same path.
ability.name: Death Ray

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, Kog'Maw gains infinite Attack Range, @PercentAttackSpeed@% Attack Speed, and his attacks deal @ModifiedPercentMaxHPDamage@% of the target's maximum Health as bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Barrage

ability.desc: Urgot fires a drill toward the farthest enemy, impacting the first enemy hit and reeling them in over @ChannelDuration@ seconds. Once they reach Urgot, he repeatedly deals 2000 true damage very quickly until they die. After each successful kill, the mana cost of this ability is reduced by @ModifiedManaCostReduction@.
ability.name: Fear Beyond Death

ability.desc: Cassiopeia launches poison at the nearest unpoisoned enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over @Duration@ seconds, and reducing the effectiveness of new shields by @ShieldReductionPercent@%.
ability.name: Noxious Blast

ability.desc: Vayne focuses for @ModifiedDuration@ seconds, tumbling away from her target immediately and every third attack thereafter. When Vayne tumbles, she becomes invisible and her next attack deals @TumbleAttackPercentAD@% of her Attack Damage.
ability.name: Final Hour

ability.desc: Janna summons five tornados which fly forward in a large cone. Tornados passing through allies grant @ModifiedPercentAttackSpeed@% Attack Speed for @BuffDuration@ seconds, while knocking up and stunning enemies for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Howling Gale

ability.desc:
Riven dashes and shields herself for @ModifiedShield@, then slashes forward dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies.

Every third cast, Riven leaps into the air and launches forward a large wave of energy that deals @ModifiedDamageFinal@ magic damage.
ability.name: Energy Slash

ability.desc:
Bard spawns a meep on his owner's bench which can be sold for 1 XP.

Passive: Bard gains an additional @ModifiedManaPerAttack@ mana each attack, but cannot gain mana in rounds with no enemy champions.
ability.name: Traveler's Call

ability.desc: Meeps can be sold in the shop for experience points. 1 meep = 1 XP
ability.name: Sell For Experience

ability.desc: Passive: Every third attack, Zed deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage and steals @ADSteal*100@% of the target's current Attack Damage.
ability.name: Contempt For The Weak

traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) The basic attacks of all allies are converted to magic damage. If allies are Star Guardians, basic attacks deal true damage instead.
traits.name: Paragon

traits.desc:
All allies gain @PercentAttackSpeed@% Attack Speed every few seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @Frequency@ seconds
traits.name: Chrono

traits.desc:
At the start of combat, Rebels gain a shield and bonus damage for each adjacent Rebel. The shield lasts for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield & @DamageAmp@% Damage
traits.name: Rebel

traits.desc:
Whenever a Space Pirate lands a killing blow on a Champion there is a chance to drop extra loot.

(@MinUnits@) @CoinDropChance@% for 1 gold
(@MinUnits@) @CoinDropChance@% for 1 gold and @ItemDropChance@% for a component item
traits.name: Space Pirate

traits.desc:
After dealing or taking 10 instances of damage, Battlecast Champions deal magic damage to the nearest enemy. If below half health, they heal instead.

(@MinUnits@) @HealOrDamageAmount@ Healing or Damage
traits.name: Battlecast

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Mana-Reaver attacks increase the mana cost of their target's next spellcast by @CostIncreasePercent@%.</expandRow>
traits.name: Mana-Reaver

traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Infiltrators move to the enemy's backline.

Infiltrators gain Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds at the start of combat, refreshed on takedown.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% bonus Attack Speed
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% bonus Attack Speed
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedPercent@% bonus Attack Speed
traits.name: Infiltrator

traits.desc:
Whenever an allied Champion dies, Dark Star Champions gain Attack Damage and Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) +@ADandSP@ Attack Damage and Spell Power
traits.name: Dark Star

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Snipers deal @PercentDamageIncrease@% increased damage for each hex between themselves and their target.</expandRow>
traits.name: Sniper

traits.desc:
Blademasters' Basic Attacks have a chance to trigger two additional attacks against their target.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks and trigger on-hit effects.

(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to trigger
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to trigger
(@MinUnits@) @ProcChance@% Chance to trigger
traits.name: Blademaster

traits.desc:
All allies have increased Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) @AP@% Spell Power
traits.name: Sorcerer

traits.desc:
Brawlers gain bonus Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Health
traits.name: Brawler

traits.desc: (@MinUnits@) Astro Champions' abilities cost @ManaCostReduction@ less mana to cast.
traits.name: Astro

traits.desc: Innate: Starships gain @ManaPerSecond@ mana per second, maneuver around the board, and are immune to movement impairing effects, but can't make Basic Attacks.
traits.name: Starship

traits.desc:
All allies gain Magic Resistance.

(@MinUnits@) @MagicResist@ Magic Resistance
traits.name: Mystic

traits.desc: <expandRow>(@MinUnits@) Damage from Demolitionists' spellcasts stuns their targets for @StunDuration@ seconds. (Once per spellcast)</expandRow>
traits.name: Demolitionist

traits.desc:
Protectors shield themselves for @Duration@ seconds whenever they cast a spell. This shield doesn't stack.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercent@% Maximum Health Shield
traits.name: Protector

traits.desc:
Cybernetic champions with at least one item (component or full) gain Health and Attack Damage.

(@MinUnits@) @HealthAmp@ Health and @ADAmp@ Attack Damage
traits.name: Cybernetic

traits.desc:
Every fourth Basic Attack from a Blaster fires additional attacks at random enemies.

These additional attacks deal damage like Basic Attacks, trigger on-hit effects, and can critically hit.

(@MinUnits@) @AdditionalAttacks@ Additional Attacks
traits.name: Blaster

traits.desc: Innate: Upgrades for Mercenaries' spells have a chance to appear in the shop.
traits.name: Mercenary

traits.desc:
All allies heal for some of the damage they deal with spells and attacks.

(@MinUnits@) @HealPercent@% Healing
traits.name: Celestial

traits.desc:
Star Guardians' spellcasts grant Mana to other Star Guardians, spread among them.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaRestore@ Total Mana
traits.name: Star Guardian

traits.desc:
Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor.

(@MinUnits@) @Armor@ Armor
traits.name: Vanguard

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, three random Mech-Pilots are teleported into a Super-Mech.

The Super-Mech has the Traits of its pilots, 3 random items from among them, and gains 60% of the combined Pilots' health and attack damage.

When the Super-Mech dies the Pilots are ejected with @EjectedPilotHealthPercent@% of their maximum health and continue to fight.
traits.name: Mech-Pilot

ability.desc: Aatrox pulls @NumberOfTargets@ of the farthest enemies toward himself, then slams the ground in front of himself, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies hit.
ability.name: Infernal Chains

ability.desc: Ahri begins channeling energy into her spirit orb. After 1.5 seconds, she lobs it toward a random enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a large area.
ability.name: Spirit Bomb

ability.desc: Akali throws kunai at her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Five Point Strike

ability.desc: Annie blasts a cone of fire, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies in front of her, then creates a shield with @ModifiedShield@ health on herself for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Burst Shield

ability.desc: Aphelios summons a turret for @ModifiedDuration@ seconds. An extension of his will, the turret counts as Aphelios himself when it fires and deals damage, and dies when he dies.
ability.name: Sentry Turret

ability.desc: Ashe gains @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds, and her attacks fire a flurry of arrows for @ModifiedADDamage@ physical damage.
ability.name: Hunter's Focus

ability.desc: Azir calls forth a wall of charging soldiers from behind him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to and slowing all enemies hit for @SlowDuration@ seconds. Enemies close to Azir are knocked back, while enemies further away are knocked up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Emperor's Divide

ability.desc: Cassiopeia projects a cone of magic energy at her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies hit, stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds, and causing them to take @ModifiedDamageAmp@ increased damage while stunned.
ability.name: Petrifying Gaze

ability.desc: Diana shields herself against @ModifiedShield@ damage over @ShieldDuration@ seconds and summons @Orbs@ orbs to orbit around her. These orbs explode for @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage when they contact an enemy, refreshing her shield when the final one explodes.
ability.name: Pale Cascade

ability.desc: Elise transforms into a spider, gaining @ModifiedPercentHealth@ maximum health and causing her attacks to restore @ModifiedLifesteal@ health.
ability.name: Spider Form

ability.desc:
Evelynn deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to up to 3 nearby enemies, then teleports away.

This damage is increased to @ModifiedCritDamage@ against targets below @ExecuteThreshholdPercent@ Health.
ability.name: Last Caress

ability.desc: Fiora enters a defensive stance for @BlockDuration@ seconds, which makes her immune to damage and enemy spell effects. Afterwards, she strikes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to a nearby enemy and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Riposte

ability.desc: Garen spins his sword for @SpinDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies and reducing incoming magic damage by @MagicDamageReduction*100@% over the duration.
ability.name: Judgement

ability.desc: Hecarim creates an aura around him for @Duration@ seconds. Each enemy within takes @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, and heals Hecarim for @ModifiedHealing@, over the duration.
ability.name: Spirit Of Life

ability.desc: Irelia launches a storm of blades in front of her, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, applying on-hit effects, and disarming enemies for @DisarmDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Bladestorm

ability.desc: Janna shields her @NumAllies@ lowest-Health allies for @ModifiedShieldAmount@ for @Duration@ seconds. Shielded allies also gain @ShieldAD@ Attack Damage for the duration.
ability.name: Eye of the Storm

ability.desc:
Passive: Jhin always attacks @AttackSpeed@ times per second. He converts each 1% of bonus Attack Speed into @ADFromAttackSpeed@ Attack Damage.

Passive: Every fourth shot, Jhin deals @ModifiedPercent@ damage. (Total: @TooltipDamage@)
ability.name: Whisper

ability.desc: Jax dodges all incoming attacks for @Duration@ seconds, then strikes all nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Counter Strike

ability.desc: Jinx fires a rocket, stunning her target for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to her target and all adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Fishbones

ability.desc: Passive: Kalista's spears remain in her target, each one capable of dealing @ModifiedDamage@ of the target's maximum Health in magic damage when removed. She removes the spears when doing so would kill the target.
ability.name: Rend

ability.desc: Kennen summons a storm around himself for @Duration@ seconds, calling down lightning bolts on all enemies in the area every @TickRate@ second and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration. Each enemy struck by 3 lightning bolts is stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom

ability.desc: Wolf mauls Kindred's target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and reducing their healing by 50% for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds. Meanwhile, Lamb leaps away from Kindred's target.
ability.name: Dance of Dread

ability.desc:
Lee Sin punches his target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage, knocking them back to the edge of the battlefield, and stunning them for @PrimaryStunDuration@ seconds. Any enemies the target collides with during the knockback receive half the damage and are stunned for @SecondaryStunDuration@ seconds.

If the target cannot be pushed back any further, they are knocked out of the battlefield instead, removing them from combat.

If the target is still alive, Lee Sin will dash to them.
ability.name: God Fist

ability.desc: Lillia casts a magical lullaby, causing @NumTargets@ waking enemies with the highest current Health to fall asleep for @Duration@ seconds. Enemies will awaken if they take @BreakDamage@ damage while sleeping, causing an additional @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.
ability.name: Lilting Lullaby

ability.desc: Lulu makes a low-Health ally giant, granting them @ModifiedBonusHealth@ bonus Health and knocking up enemies near them for @CCDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Wild Growth

ability.desc: Lux fires a sphere of light towards her farthest enemy. Enemies in the sphere's path take @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and are stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Light Binding

ability.desc: Maokai smashes the ground sending forward a shockwave, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and slowing Attack Speed by 50% for @ASSlowDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Bramble Smash

ability.desc: Morgana hallows the ground beneath her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies within over @Duration@ seconds and shredding 40% of their Magic Resistance while they remain inside. Morgana heals for @HealPercent@% of the damage dealt.
ability.name: Hallowed Ground

ability.desc: Nami traps the closest enemy in her bubble, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Aqua Prison

ability.desc: Nidalee throws her javelin at her farthest enemy, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage plus @PercentPerHex*100@% more for each hex traveled.
ability.name: Javelin Toss

ability.desc: Pyke leaves a phantom at his location, then dashes behind the farthest enemy. After @StunDelay@ second, his phantom returns to Pyke, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies it passes through and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Phantom Undertow

ability.desc: Willump bites his target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage. If Willump's target has less Health than he does before the bite, it deals an additional @DamageAmp*100@% damage and becomes true damage.
ability.name: Consume

ability.desc:
Riven dashes and shields herself for @ModifiedShield@, then slashes forward dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to nearby enemies.

Every third cast, Riven leaps into the air and launches forward a large wave of energy that deals @ModifiedDamageFinal@ magic damage.
ability.name: Sweeping Strikes

ability.desc: Sejuani throws a giant firecracker at the closest enemy that explodes after a @ExplosionDelay@-second delay. Enemies within receive @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and are stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Firecracker

ability.desc: Sett grabs his target and slams them forward, dealing @ModifiedPercentMaxHealthDamagePrimary@ of their maximum Health in magic damage to them, and @ModifiedPercentMaxHealthDamageSecondary@ of the slammed enemy's maximum Health to all other enemies in a large area.
ability.name: Showstopper

ability.desc: Shen dashes past his target, shielding himself against @ModifiedShield@ damage and taunting all adjacent enemies for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Shadow Dash

ability.desc: Sylas lashes his chains out in a @HexDistance@-hex line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to enemies hit and increasing the cost of their next spell by 33%.
ability.name: Chain Lash

ability.desc: Tahm Kench takes @ModifiedDR@ reduced damage from all sources.
ability.name: Thick Skin

ability.desc: Talon stabs his target, striking them for @PercentOfAD*100@% of his Attack Damage plus @TooltipBonusDamage@ bonus physical damage (total: <scaleAD>@ModifiedDamage@ %i:scaleAD%</scaleAD>). If this kills them, Talon becomes unstoppable, untargetable, and invulnerable while he leaps to the enemy who's done the most damage this round and refunds all his mana.
ability.name: Truestrike

ability.desc: Teemo fires a dart at the enemy with the highest Attack Speed. The dart explodes into a cloud of spores on contact, poisoning nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies take @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over @Duration@ seconds and are blinded for the duration.
ability.name: Sporecloud Dart

ability.desc: Thresh throws his lantern to the lowest-Health ally, shielding them and nearby allies against @ModifiedShield@ damage for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Spectral Lantern

ability.desc: Lissandra hurls a dagger toward her target, which deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to the first target it hits. After hitting its initial target or at its final destination, the dagger explodes dealing @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ magic damage to nearby targets.
ability.name: 1000 Daggers

ability.desc: Twisted Fate throws three cards in a cone that deal @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to each enemy they pass through.
ability.name: Wild Cards

ability.desc: Passive: Whenever Vayne attacks the same target 3 times, she deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus true damage on the third attack.
ability.name: Silver Bolts

ability.desc:
Veigar blasts the enemy with the lowest Health, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage.

If this kills his target, Veigar permanently gains @APToAdd@ Spell Power.
ability.name: Dark Blossom

ability.desc: Wukong slams his target with his staff, dealing @ModifiedPercentAD@ of his Attack Damage as physical damage and stunning them for @Duration@ seconds. (Total Damage: @TooltipDamage@)
ability.name: Crushing Blow

ability.desc: Xin Zhao sweeps around him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ of his Attack Damage (total: @TooltipDamage@) and Challenging enemies hit for @Duration@ seconds. While an enemy is Challenged, Xin Zhao deals @DamageAmp*100@% increased Attack Damage to them, and takes @DamageReduction*100@% reduced damage from all other sources.
ability.name: Crescent Guard

ability.desc: Yasuo strikes forward two hexes, attacking for @ModifiedDamage@ of his Attack Damage (total: @TooltipDamage@). If he can't hit two targets from where he's standing, he'll first dash to a place where he can.
ability.name: Striking Steel

ability.desc:
Yone strikes along a path in front of him, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage split between all enemies hit and knocking them up for @KnockUpDuration@ seconds. Enemies hit are marked for death, reducing their Armor and Magic Resist by @ShredPercent@%.

Yone's spell is then replaced with Unforgotten until there are no remaining enemies marked for death.

Unforgotten (20 mana): Yone dashes to the lowest-Health enemy that is marked for death, dealing @ModifiedUnforgottenDamage@ plus their missing health as magic damage.
ability.name: Seal Fate

ability.desc: Yuumi dashes to the lowest-Health ally, healing them for @ModifiedHealing@ of their missing Health and granting them @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds. She then repeats this on the farthest ally.
ability.name: Zoomies

ability.desc: Passive: Every third attack, Zed deals @ModifiedDamage@ bonus magic damage and steals @ADSteal*100@% of the target's current Attack Damage.
ability.name: Contempt For The Weak

ability.desc: Zilean places a protective Time Rune on the @NumTargets@ allies with the lowest Health other than himself. When they would die, they instead resurrect after @ReviveDelay@ seconds, returning to combat with @HealthAmountCalc@ Health and shedding all negative effects. After resurrecting, they have @ModifiedAS@ bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Rewind Fate

ability.desc: Vi's attack blasts through her target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage to all enemies in a cone and reducing their Armor by @ArmorReduction*100@% for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Denting Blow

ability.desc: Jarvan IV throws his standard near the farthest enemy then pulls himself toward them with his lance, dealing @DamageCalc@ magic damage to enemies he passes through,  knocking them up and stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds as well.
ability.name: Dragon Strike

ability.desc:
Kayn dashes toward his target then slashes all adjacent enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and increasing the cost of their next spell by 33%. If the slash hits exactly one target, Kayn immediately casts again.

As Rhaast: Reaping Slash heals Kayn for @PercentRestored*100@% of the damage it deals.

As Shadow Assassin: Reaping Slash deals an extra @ShadowDamagePercent@% damage for the first @ShadowDuration@ seconds of combat.
ability.name: Reaping Slash

ability.desc: Katarina channels for @Duration@ seconds, throwing knives at @NumberOfTargets@ nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage over the duration and reducing healing by 50% to her targets for @GrievousWoundsDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Death Lotus

ability.desc: Ezreal fires a barrage toward the enemy with the highest Attack Speed, healing allies it passes through for @ModifiedHeal@ and granting them  50% Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds. To enemies, it deals @ModifiedDamage@ magic damage and slows their Attack Speed by 50% for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Flux Barrage

ability.desc: Warwick gains @ModifiedAS@ Attack Speed, @LifestealPercent@% Lifesteal, and moves faster for the rest of combat. While in this state, if Warwick scores a takedown he howls, stunning all adjacent enemies for @FearDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Primal Hunger

ability.desc: Azir's Sand Guards accompany their Emperor on the battlefield. They don't attack, but they get in the enemy's way.
ability.name: Stand Firm

ability.desc: Galio reduces all incoming damage by @BaseDR*100@% for @Duration@ seconds, taunting all nearby enemies for the duration. At the end of the taunt, he sends out a pulse of infernal fire, dealing @EndDamage@ magic damage to enemies around him.
ability.name: Provocation Aura

traits.desc:
Upon attacking @NumAttacksToProc@ times or dropping below @HealthThreshold@% Health, Divine champions remove all crowd control and ascend, taking @DamageReductionPercent@% reduced damage and dealing @BonusTrueDamagePercent@% bonus true damage for the duration.

(@MinUnits@) @Duration@ seconds
traits.name: Divine

traits.desc:
Adepts calm the flow of battle, reducing the Attack Speed of all enemies by 50% for a few seconds at the start of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedSlowDuration@ seconds
traits.name: Adept

traits.desc: When The Boss first drops below 40% Health, he leaves combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores @HealPercent@% of his maximum Health and gives him @AttackSpeedPercent@% Attack and Movement Speed. If he reaches full Health he returns to combat Pumped Up: all of his attacks and spells deal true damage. If all of his allies die, he will immediately return to combat.
traits.name: The Boss

traits.desc:
Brawlers gain bonus Health.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ Health
traits.name: Brawler

traits.desc:
Innate: When combat starts, Shades teleport to the enemy backline.

After every @NumberOfAttacks@ attacks Shades dip into the shadows, stealthing and causing their next basic attack to deal bonus magic damage.

(@MinUnits@) @Damage@ bonus damage
traits.name: Shade

traits.desc:
All allies gain Magic Resistance.

(@MinUnits@) @MagicResist@ Magic Resistance
traits.name: Mystic

traits.desc:
Enlightened champions generate more Mana.

(@MinUnits@) @ManaAmp@% increase
traits.name: Enlightened

traits.desc:
Innate: At the start of combat, Assassins leap to the enemy backline.

Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage and Chance, and their spells can critically strike.

(@MinUnits@) +@CritAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Damage & +@CritChanceAmpPercent@% Critical Strike Chance
traits.name: Assassin

traits.desc:
Ninjas gain bonus Attack Damage and Spell Power.

This trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Ninjas.

(@MinUnits@) Ninja gains +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) All Ninjas gain +@ADValue@ Attack Damage & +@APValue@% Spell Power
traits.name: Ninja

traits.desc:
Innate: Duelists gain bonus Movement Speed.

Duelists' attacks grant Attack Speed, up to @MaxStacks@ stacks.

(@MinUnits@) +@AttackSpeed@% Attack Speed per stack
traits.name: Duelist

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) At the start of combat, a number of Moonlight Champions star up once until combat ends.

(Prioritizes the lowest star-level champions. If tied, champions with the most items are chosen.)

(@MinUnits@) @NumberOfChampions@ Champion
(@MinUnits@) @NumberOfChampions@ Champions
traits.name: Moonlight

traits.desc:
Warlords have bonus Health and Spell Power. Each victorious combat they participate in increases the bonus by @VictoryPercent@%, stacking up to @MaxCombats@ times.

(@MinUnits@) @InitialHealth@ Health & @InitialSP@ Spell Power
traits.name: Warlord

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer you've gone without an orb, the bigger the payout!
(@MinUnits@) Wins give an extra bonus orb with rare loot.
traits.name: Fortune

traits.desc:
The first time a Spirit casts their spell, all allies gain Attack Speed based on the spell's mana cost.

(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedManaCostPercent@% of mana cost
(@MinUnits@) @AttackSpeedManaCostPercent@% of mana cost
traits.name: Spirit

traits.desc: The Emperor deploys with two Sand Guards who can be placed anywhere on the battlefield. They do not move or attack, and die when their Emperor does.
traits.name: Emperor

traits.desc:
If an Exile has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain:

(@MinUnits@) A shield equal to @ShieldPercent@% of their maximum health
(@MinUnits@) And @LifeSteal@% Lifesteal
traits.name: Exile

traits.desc:
Dusk champions increase all allies' Spell Power.
(@MinUnits@) All allies gain @TeamSpellPower@% Spell Power
(@MinUnits@) And Dusk champions gain an additional @DuskSpellPower@%
(@MinUnits@) @TeamSpellPower@% Spell Power for all, and an extra @DuskSpellPower@% for Dusk champions
traits.name: Dusk

traits.desc:
Every two seconds all Elderwood champions grow, gaining bonus stats. This effect stacks up to five times.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusResists@ Armor and Magic Resist, @BonusADSP@ Attack Damage and Spell Power
traits.name: Elderwood

traits.desc:
Mages cast twice and have modified Spell Power.

(@MinUnits@) @SPPercent@% of their total Spell Power
traits.name: Mage

traits.desc: Tormented can be transformed after participating in @RoundsToTransform@ combats, enhancing their abilities.
traits.name: Tormented

traits.desc:
Every few seconds, all Hunters will attack the lowest percent Health enemy, dealing bonus damage.

(@MinUnits@) @DamageAmp@% bonus damage every @ShotFrequency@ seconds
traits.name: Hunter

traits.desc:
Sharpshooters attacks and spells ricochet to nearby enemies dealing reduced damage.

(@MinUnits@) @MaxBounces@ ricochets with @PercentDamageReduction@% reduced damage
traits.name: Sharpshooter

traits.desc:
Vanguard champions gain bonus Armor.

(@MinUnits@) @Armor@ Armor
traits.name: Vanguard

traits.desc:
Once your team loses @CultistHealthPercentTaken@% of their Health, Galio is summoned, slamming into the largest cluster of enemies and knocking them up. Galio's strength increases based on the total star level of all active Cultists.
(@MinUnits@) Tyrant Galio
(@MinUnits@) Demon Lord Galio
(@MinUnits@) Supreme Overlord Galio
traits.name: Cultist

traits.desc:
Dazzlers' spells reduce the Attack Damage of enemies hit by 50% for a few seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @Duration@ seconds
traits.name: Dazzler

traits.desc:
At the start of combat, Keepers grant themselves and all nearby allies a shield for @Duration@ seconds. This shield is @KeeperBonus@% stronger on Keepers.


(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@-strength shield
traits.name: Keeper
